ygData.subject: Re: A little off topic but...
ygData.msgSnippet: I d go with Runeblade, personally. I think when I *finally* get my name, it will have light in there somehow. Eglath of Felwithe (level 15 Paladin) (also
ygData.messageBody:
I'd go with Runeblade, personally. I think when I *finally* get my name,
it will have light in there somehow.

Eglath of Felwithe (level 15 Paladin)
(also Mozaic of Kelethin level 7 Druid)
...see what happens when you split an account? your fiance uses it all the
time and you have to get a new one and start from scratch. ;)

---
"...if a conclusion is not poetically balanced, it cannot be
scientifically true."
--Isaac Asimov, Robots of Dawn
